text: Akho, ki mai' alaha tom binham kise hora nu apana saha'i banavam. Jihara dharati ate akasam nu bana'una vala hai ate uha sabha nu khu'a'unda hai usa nu ko'i nahi khu'a'unda. Akho, mainu hukama mili'a hai ki maim sabha tom pahilam agi'a da palana karana vala bana ate tusim kade vi musarikam (buta puja karana vali'am) vica samila na hovo
